fields.name: spacercomplete
fields.fieldText:
.

.

.

fields.name: dispTextComplete
fields.fieldText:
﻿Check In Complete!

A Dreampass was emailed to "{!objAttendee.PersonEmail}". Have them use this to gain access to all Salesforce Spaces.



Note: this Dreampass will be valid for 36hrs. Please inform them to receive an onsite PCR test (if they haven't already done so) to extend the Dreampass for the remainder of the event.



﻿
